title: (x) Pixco pixel font - Mini 7 {Dav}
content:
Hi, anyone knows what this font is?   
Tx in advance!   
 ![pixelfont](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054629im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68847.jpg)
author: ase

comments.content: Should be THE original pixel classic, ' [Mini](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054629/http:/www.minifonts.com/mini7.html) [7](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054629/http:/www.wpdfd.com/mini7.htm)', by Joe Gillespie..
